metadata.description: Opening credits of the new Mercedes Benz initiative.
metadata.title: Mercedes-Benz | GLA Social Drive Experience

cover.title: Mercedes-Benz | GLA Social Drive Experience
cover.subtitle: Opening credits of the new Mercedes Benz initiative.

title: Mercedes-Benz | GLA Social Drive Experience
credits:
**Direction:** Arturo Vittorioso, Arnaldo Funaro

**Producer:** Emily Szereda

**Illustration:** Simone Macciocchi

**Animation:** Serena Paratore

**Agency:** Gruppo Roncaglia

**Creative Director:** Arturo Vittorioso

**Art Director:** Simone Macciocchi

**Copywriter:** Elisa Caracciolo
description:
Mercedes - Benz Italia has launched an interesting initiative to discover to the Italian the new GLA.\
It was possible to test the car to 21 people who later issued a short interview.\
These 21 events were held in different days and locations in order to know the opinion of the people and with the intent to pass a really important day.
